## Section 3: Derivatives in R

```{r}
# f(x)=x^2 at x = 3
ex_1 <- expression(x ^ 2)
x <- 3

deriv_1 <- D(ex_1, 'x')
deriv_1

eval(deriv_1)
```

```{r}
# 2 * (3a + 2) ^ 4 âˆ’ 5 at a = 1.2
ex_2 <- expression(2 * (3 * a + 2) ^ 4 - 5)
a <- 1.2

deriv_2 <- D(ex_2, 'a')
deriv_2

eval(deriv_2)
```

```{r}
# -4 * t / (t ^ 2 + 1) ^ 3 at t = 0
ex_3 <- expression(-4 * t / (t ^ 2 + 1) ^ 3)
t <- 0

deriv_3 <- D(ex_3, 't')
deriv_3

eval(deriv_3)
```


## Section 4: Make a penguin plot

```{r}
ggplot(data = penguins, aes(x = bill_length_mm, y = bill_depth_mm)) +
  geom_jitter(aes(color = species), size = 1) +
  labs(x = "Bill length (mm)",
       y = "Bill depth (mm)",
       title = "Penguin bill length versus bill depth")
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = penguins, aes(x = species, y = flipper_length_mm)) +
  geom_jitter(aes(color = species)) +
  labs(x = "Species",
       y = "Flipper length (mm)",
       title = "Flipper length by species") +
  theme_bw()
```
